TopicTitle: How do I target another vessel?

Articles.Content: I'm trying to try out docking in KSP2.  How do I set another vessel as the target?
Right-click on it and select "Set as target."

4 minutes ago, Periple said:

Right-click on it and select "Set as target."

That works in KSP 1, but that doesn't seem to work here.  Right-clicking on the vessel (in map view) doesn't do anything,

I want to target it so that I can look for close approaches when I try to raise my orbit.  Is there some way to do that from the map view or in the tracking station while one vessel is in focus?

Huh strange, I just did that when I did a short Mun mission and had to plot an encounter with my return ship. I'm pretty sure it was right-click and select from the menu. Maybe your game is bugging out? Quitting to main menu (and saving) then reloading the game solved a lot of glitches like this for me.
Yup -- restarting did the trick!  Thank you.
